General.Name: Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacture, distribution, and trading of cigarettes in Indonesia. The company sells its products under the Dji Sam Soe Magnum, Sampoerna Kretek, Sampoerna A, and Marlboro Filter Black brand names. It also engages in the general trading; operation of digital platform for commercial and agency; provision of leisure and golf course services; and property development. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Philip Morris Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Rungkut Industri Raya No.18, Surabaya, Indonesia, 60293
